The user [[Summoning Technique|summon]]s several [[snake]]s from under their sleeve, deploying them against a target as a surprise. The snakes do as their summoner commands, attacking or capturing targets by biting or constricting them.<ref name="d1"/> The snakes can also help the user latch to the surroundings, pulling the summoner towards a destination to help them get around faster. Because of the snakes' length, they can be used from a fair distance away.<ref name="c359">''Naruto'' chapter 359</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In the anime, [[Orochimaru]] can use this technique via his mouth, in which his tongue transforms into a snake.<ref>''Naruto'' episode 69</ref>
* [[Sasuke Uchiha]] is shown performing this technique without sleeves, the snakes being summoned from his bare shoulders.<ref name="c359"/>
